reviews.review_msg: Prof Minard is undoubtedly passionate about what he teaches, however, I found that he graded assignments on the harsher side. This may be partially due to the fact that he doesn't really give out a proper rubric or detailed enough assignment instructions for the various papers/projects that had to be done. Also, participation matters in the class!
Truly wonderful professor. Engaging, fun, and encouraging. Impressive depth and breadth of knowledge. Just put in some effort (do the readings - they're good for you!) and he'll recognize it.
